title: Patients in grim condition as cancer hospitals experience drug shortage
content: The Maharagama Apeksha Hospital has been experiencing a shortage of medicines and drugs for a certain period of time. Meanwhile, issues due to the shortage of drugs in hospitals treating cancer patients have aggravated the situation. Apeksha Hospital in Maharagama is the premier treatment center for cancer patients in the country. “I have to purchase this personally because I didn’t have a choice.
